metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35545 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Time-based SQL injection exists in Spotweb 1.4.9 via the query string.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the fix for this issue introduces the vulnerability for which CVE-2021-3286 was assigned. This fix is therefore considered incomplete. The bug opened to report this (#653 in the spotweb code repository) has been closed with no valid fix being made available so that the original issue can be solved without the introduction of a new vulnerability. This is the status as of 2022-07-04.

criterions.comment: spotweb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
